word:
But where does the skill and knowledge you possess come from? Have you manufactured it? No. It comes from the God of heaven, and He will require it of you again. What have you done with the gift of reason God has given you? Have you studied the Scriptures and trusted your souls to 


                -34- 

the Master? We want to understand how to keep this house in order [so] that we can serve God acceptably.
